amendment.description: To reduce the amounts appropriated to be 2 percent less than the amount appropriated for fiscal year 2019.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1019 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 24 - 67. Record Vote Number: 335.

action.text: Amendment SA 1019 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6185, S6186-6187; text: CR S6185) To reduce the amounts appropriated to be 2 percent less than the amount appropriated for fiscal year 2019.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1019 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 948.
